### General Maintenance Services - Nunatsiavut Settlement Area of Labrador

**Reference Number**: cb-776-58570182

**Solicitation Number**: M1000-4-0264

**Contracting Entity**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police

**Publicatoin Date**: March 5, 2024

**Close-out Date**: March 26, 2024 13:00:00 (Eastern Time)

### Solicitation Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified offers for a Standing Offer for general maintenance services for RCMP detachments and employee housing in the Nunatsiavut settlement area of Labrador. The proposed services must comply with the requirements outlined in the Statement of Work (Annex B).

### Scheduled Services

A Standing Offer is scheduled to begin immediately following contract award and continue for a period of one year with possible extension options up to two years. Services will include, but are not limited to:

* Heating, ventilation, and air circulation
* Plumbing system maintenance or repair
* Electrical services
* Plumbing and heating and air conditioning
* Carpentry
* Flooring services
* Renovation of buildings or landmarks or monuments

### Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible for this Standing Offer, Offerors must certify that they are an Indigenous Business, as defined by the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business, and comply with all requirements of the strategy. Refer to Annex 9.4 of the Public Services and Procurement Canada's Supply Manual for detailed information.

### Important Notes

This Standing Offer is not subject to the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement – Labrador Inuit Land Claims Agreement (LILCA). A security requirement is associated with this Standing Offer.

### How to Bid

Bids must be sent to the Bid Receiving Unit at [ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca).

Refer to Annex A (Request for Standing Offer) and Annex B (Specifications) for a detailed description of the required services. Other related documents are also available.

### Additional Resources

For information on how to get your company listed in the Indigenous Business Directory, please visit: [www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory.](http://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory.)
